title: How to Become a Witch or Warlock in The Sims 2

steps.title: Make sure that you have the Apartment Life Expansion Pack installed.
steps.content: Make sure that you have the Apartment Life Expansion Pack installed.

steps.title: Go to a community lot and look for a Sim with a pointy hat, with these colors:
steps.content: Go to a community lot and look for a Sim with a pointy hat, with these colors: White and Blue, Brown and Gold, or Black and Purple.

steps.title: Become friends with the witch/warlock.
steps.content: Become friends with the witch/warlock. If you can't get to 50 Daily Relationship in one conversation, invite them to your house.

steps.title: Keep them over there for a while.
steps.content: Keep them over there for a while. Soon they will cast Magus Mutatio on your Sim. Congratulations, you're a witch or a warlock!

steps.title: Type in "boolprop testingcheatsenabled true" while in the neighborhood screen (type it in without the quotations).
steps.content: Type in "boolprop testingcheatsenabled true" while in the neighborhood screen (type it in without the quotations).

steps.title: SHIFT+CLICK on the mailbox of the desired family.
steps.content: SHIFT+CLICK on the mailbox of the desired family.

steps.title: Go to spawn 'NPC...'
steps.content: Go to spawn 'NPC...' Grand (depends on what alignment you want) Witch/warlock and click it.

steps.title: When the witch spawns, shift-click her and press "MAKE SELECTABLE" then click your Sim (not shift-click) and go to 'cast spell...'
steps.content: When the witch spawns, shift-click her and press "MAKE SELECTABLE" then click your Sim (not shift-click) and go to 'cast spell...' Magus Mutatio Now your Sim is a witch/warlock!
